content:
CRISPRVar: Genome Editing Analysis

Comprehensive analysis of CRISPR/Cas9 editing outcomes from amplicon sequencing. Quantifies editing efficiency, characterizes mutations, and detects off-target effects.

Applications

  • Editing Efficiency: Measure % edited cells/alleles
  • Indel Characterization: Deletions, insertions, substitutions
  • Off-Target Detection: Unintended editing sites
  • HDR Validation: Homology-directed repair outcomes

Key Outputs

  • Editing Efficiency: % indels at target site
  • Allele Frequencies: Distribution of mutations
  • Indel Patterns: Size distribution, microhomology
  • Off-Target Rates: Predicted vs observed

Perfect for: CRISPR editing validation • Indel analysis • Off-target screening • Gene therapy QC
